00045 /**************************************************************************
00046 * DEFINITIONS
00047 **************************************************************************/
00048 #define FB_FRAME_ERR    (1 << 7) 
00049 #define FB_PARITY_ERR   (1 << 6) 
00050 #define FB_COLLISION    (1 << 5) 
00051 
00052 #define FB_CHAR_REC     (1 << 3) 
00053 #define FB_BUS_FREE     (1 << 2) 
00054 
00055 #define FB_ACK_REC      (1 << 1) 
00056 #define FB_MESSAGE      (1 << 0) 
00057 
00058 /*********************************/
00059 /* MACROs for port configuration */
00060 /*********************************/
00061 #define OFF          0U             
00062 #define ON           1U             
00064 #define IO_INPUT     0U             
00065 #define IO_OUTPUT    1U             
00067 /* define different panic calls here */
00068 #define PANIC_MEMORY        0x01    
00069 #define PANIC_RESOURCE      0x02    
00070 #define PANIC_EEPROM        0x03    
00071 #define PANIC_NO_MSG        0x04    
00078 #define _NOP() do { __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); } while (0)
